channel.title: [show-off] Full ninja! With ninja sword! [show-off] Mat release if!
channel.description:
Ok so this is my full ninja!!! have fun... give me some tips... tell me what i cna do better and please dont flame this is only my 3rd model... And the weapons for this are comign later... i did the body and legs jagex gets full credits for helmet though i just re colered helmet...
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Ninja.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/NinjaSword.png[/img] Thanks, Buddy

item.title: [show-off] Full ninja! With ninja sword! [show-off] Mat release if!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

[quote=“Buddy_budster, post:17, topic:267180”][quote author=Mr. Linksys link=topic=352740.msg2707611#msg2707611 date=1237100380]
Please stop the editing and make your own models.
[/quote]
Thanks for the constructive critism and other stuff and as for your flaming… shut the fuck up and get a life this is from scratch except for the helmet u stupid little nerd…[/quote]
Somebody’s PMSing. Because your conceited doesn’t mean you can diss on better modelers.

Read full topic
